title: SURGE-WSI System Overview
prompt: Create a professional hero illustration for SURGE-WSI algorithmic trading system. Show a central brain-like neural network connected to financial market elements: candlestick charts, forex currency pairs (GBPUSD, EURUSD), MetaTrader 5 logo, database symbols, and Telegram notification icons. Use a dark blue gradient background (#0F172A to #1E3A8A) with glowing cyan (#06B6D4) and emerald (#10B981) accent lines connecting all components. Modern fintech aesthetic with clean geometric shapes. The text 'SURGE-WSI' should be prominently displayed with subtitle 'Weekly Swing Intelligence'. Include subtle grid lines suggesting data analysis.
negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, amateur, cluttered, too many colors, cartoonish, unprofessional, hand-drawn sketchy style, watermarks
